name: a simple tee "WHAT REALLY MATTERS?"
description:
>>WHAT REALLY MATTERS?...
Have we lost track of what really matters to us in this chaotic period? For most of the time, we just simply miss out the ones that matters and chase after what we assume is important.
"Let’s slow down and reconsider."


DESIGN. “a simple tee by simply me” is a concept of combining simple illustrations with short phrases that carries a message. Each message was based from K's odd little thoughts that she wanted to share with others.

QUALITY. a simple tee is a 100% organic cotton t-shirt that provides superior softness to our senses without causing any irritation to the skin. We used non toxic water based printing inks for digital printing. The reduction of toxic and chemicals usage in the process of t-shirt production makes both our skin and our planet much healthier. 

SHAPE. a simple tee is constructed in one size hugs all concept. The perfect fit of a simple tee hugs the body while ensuring space for comfort and flexibility. Each measurement was precisely custom-made to define smooth shape and lines on the body.

FREE CUSTOMIZING. We offer free customing for your ordered t-shirt with raw edges finishes, roll up sleeves or completely sleeveless! Customize your t-shirt the way you love with all the different combination of finishes. Let's make your t-shirt the one and only~ ;) 


MATERIAL. 100% ORGANIC COTTON
THIS DESIGN AVAILABLE IN REGULAR SIZE & OVERSIZE T-SHIRTS
FREE SIZE. ONE SIZE FITS ALL
COLOR. ANTIQUE WHITE (**IVORY)

REGULAR FIT SIZE CHART.
body width. 35”
body length. 26”

OVERSIZE SIZE CHART.
body width. 44”
body length. 26”


RETURNS. We inspected each item carefully before shipping to our beloved customers. However, in some cases there might be damages throughout the shipping process. Returns are accepted for any defected items, customers can send back the defected items in exchange for replacement or a refund will be issued with $5 shipping charge deducted from the total.

SHIPPING. Free shipping on all US domestic orders. Items will be shipped via USPS First Class mail. International orders are accepted, but there will be additional shipping charges applied.

Please kindly confirm REGULAR FIT or OVERSIZE t-shirt for your order upon payment. Thank you.

>> LOVE IS...
Scientists believe that love is based from a chemical - Phenylalanine that  releases in our brains when we react to happiness. If love is a chemical, this means that love can be found anywhere. This extends the range of love from families and friends to wider possibilities. Start realizing the love around you today.
"Perhaps, there may be love within a t-shirt?"

name: a simple tee "READ MY MIND"
description:
>> READ MY MIND...
We always want to be understood by someone, but if we do not put our thoughts in legible terms, how could others understand?
